menu:
Ramen 13,50 €
Each ramen has Tokumaru handmade noodles, slowly boiled broth, vegetables and nori seaweed. Meat portions come with marinated egg

Akamiso Ramen
Spicy chashu pork and miso broth 

Vegan Shoyu Ramen
Soy based ramen with vegetables and shimeji mushrooms

Don 13,50 €
Bowl of sushi rice, teriyaki sauce, salad, sesame dressing, edamame beans, wakame and marinated cauliflower

Panko Chicken Don 
Breaded chicken and chili mayonnaise

Vegan Tofu Avocado Don
Fried tofu, avocado and peanut-teriyaki sauce
